      • checkStaticFunction

        protected boolean checkStaticFunction(Task task,
                          java.lang.String f,
                          java.lang.String[] sf)
        Checks if a given function is static
        Parameters:
        task - Parsed planning task
        f - Function name
        sf - Set of static functions
        Returns:
        true, if f is static. Function f is static if f is not known by this agents or if f is in the set of static functions
        Since:
        1.0
